document.full_text: lebron james muscled his way to a 35-point, 14-rebound performance as the miami heat pushed the boston celtics to the brink of playoff elimination with a 98-90 overtime triumph monday.
document.title: heat burn celtics in ot to take 3-1 lead
lines_and_colors: lebron james muscled his way to a 35-point, 14-rebound performance as the miami heat pushed the boston celtics to the brink of playoff elimination with a 98-90 overtime triumph monday.
